Package vilij.components

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionComponent
    Defines the behavior of the core actions to be handled by an application.
    DataComponent
    This interface defines the minimal functionality of the data management component of Vilij application, providing the method definitions for saving and loading the required data.
    Dialog
    This interface defines the minimal behavioral requirements of pop-up dialogs used by the Vilij framework.
    UIComponent
    This interface defines the minimal functionality of the graphical user interface of a Vilij application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfirmationDialog
    This class provides the template for displaying three-way confirmation messages to the end user of a Vilij application.
    ErrorDialog
    This class provides the template for displaying error messages to the end user of a Vilij application.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfirmationDialog.Option  
    Dialog.DialogType
